name: Minecart Mayhem (Eleanor C.)
description:
A two-player digital tile board game prototype, reach 3 of your gems first before the other player to win!

Build tracks to reach your gems and cut your opponent off from theirs!

Use bombs to blow up tracks to thwart your opponent!

Connect to unlinked tracks to steal them from your opponent!

Detailed rules and instructions can be found in-game.

Controls

Left click - Select/Place/Use

Right click - Rotate selected tile
